KratosMod:ablockalypse.NAME: Ablockalypse!
KratosMod:ablockalypse.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 3 Vulnerable. NL Exhaust.

KratosMod:blades.NAME: Blades of Chaos
KratosMod:blades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply !M! Weak to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Vengeance. NL Exhaust.

KratosMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
KratosMod:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

KratosMod:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
KratosMod:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
KratosMod:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

KratosMod:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
KratosMod:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

KratosMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
KratosMod:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !KratosMod:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

KratosMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
KratosMod:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !KratosMod:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

KratosMod:rattle.NAME: Rattle
KratosMod:rattle.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, remove 1 Strength or apply Weak to a random enemy.
KratosMod:rattle.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, remove 1 Strength or apply Weak to ALL enemies.

KratosMod:clawsofhades.NAME: Claws of Hades
KratosMod:clawsofhades.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Heal unblocked damage dealt.

KratosMod:conjuresoul.NAME: Conjure Soul
KratosMod:conjuresoul.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, heal 3 and lose 2 Dexterity.
KratosMod:conjuresoul.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, heal 3 and lose 1 Dexterity.

KratosMod:styx.NAME: Styx Cleanse
KratosMod:styx.DESCRIPTION: Lose X max HP. NL Gain X Intangible. NL Exhaust.
KratosMod:styx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Lose X max HP, gain X Intangible.

KratosMod:cyclone.NAME: Cyclone of Chaos
KratosMod:cyclone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain 1 Vengeance.

KratosMod:tartarusrage.NAME: Tartarus Rage
KratosMod:tartarusrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each stack of Vengeance. NL (Deals !D! x !M!)

KratosMod:kBerserk.NAME: Berserk
KratosMod:kBerserk.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vulnerable. At the start of your turn, gain [R].

KratosMod:FullCounter.NAME: Full Counter!
KratosMod:FullCounter.DESCRIPTION: Redirect the next attack. NL Exhaust.
KratosMod:FullCounter.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Redirect the next 2 attacks. NL Exhaust.

KratosMod:Endure.NAME: Endure
KratosMod:Endure.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. Draw 1 for each stack of Vengeance.

KratosMod:Tempor.NAME: Tempor
KratosMod:Tempor.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vengeance. Discard the top card of your draw pile.
KratosMod:Tempor.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Vengeance. Discard the top 2 cards of your draw pile.

KratosMod:Revenge.NAME: Revenge
KratosMod:Revenge.DESCRIPTION: Gain !KratosMod:SecondMagic! Vengeance. Permanently increase by !M!. NL Exhaust.

KratosMod:SmashStone.NAME: Health Stone
KratosMod:SmashStone.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL Ethereal. NL Heal !M! HP. NL Random enemy heals !M! HP.

KratosMod:AthenaBane.NAME: Athena's Bane
KratosMod:AthenaBane.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL At the end of your turn, lose ALL Vengeance. NL You cannot remove this card from your deck.
